column5: The KBI tournament is going on right now, and I just wanted to wish the leaders luck! Jason Gibbons is one of my guides and his brother Oliver is a guide at Grassy Narrows Camp. Both awesome fishermen, and they're in great shape to win it! Go get 'em guys! Also, John Gibbons (their Uncle) is a long time guide from the area, and is currently 8th! Good luck Johnny Cash!
Jason and Oliver are still in first! Way to go guys. Looks like it was a slower day for most of day 1's top 10.

Looking good! Fill your livewell tomorrow, boys! Would they be the first repeat winners? They won it in 2001. It's cool that they tag and release the fish in the same part of the lake they were caught. Jared - have you or your guests ever caught a KBI tagged fish? My hometown of Kansas City is well represented with three teams in the top 20.
Actually, yes. My uncle caught a tagged fish a couple years ago. He wasn't sure what the tag was for.
Cool. Tell Otis I'm sending him a dry cleaning bill for the present he left on my tackle box.
haha... will do! I can't believe he did that! Quite embarassing.
2nd place! A great showing. Wish they'd pulled it out, but they really gave it a run!
